Package org.example.timetracker.Repositories

Interface TimeEntriesRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<TimeEntry,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<TimeEntry,Long>
@Repository @EnableAspectJAutoProxy public interface TimeEntriesRepository extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<TimeEntry,Long>
Time Entry Repository Interface that extends CrudRepository for time entry table (Users tracking).

Repository indicates that this interface serves as a repository for Task entities. EnableAspectJAutoProxy enables AspectJ support for AOP in Spring.

    • stopAll

      @Modifying @Query(" UPDATE time_entry\n SET end_Time = NOW(), -- \u0423\u0441\u0442\u0430\u043d\u0430\u0432\u043b\u0438\u0432\u0430\u0435\u043c \u0442\u0435\u043a\u0443\u0449\u0435\u0435 \u0432\u0440\u0435\u043c\u044f \u0432 end_Time\n duration = ROUND(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, start_Time, NOW()) / 3600, 2) -- \u0440\u0430\u0441\u0447\u0435\u0442 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0434\u043e\u043b\u0436\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438 \u0438 \u043e\u043a\u0440\u0443\u0433\u043b\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435 \u0434\u043e 2 \u0437\u043d\u0430\u043a\u043e\u0432 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u043b\u0435 \u0437\u0430\u043f\u044f\u0442\u043e\u0439\n WHERE\n end_Time IS NULL;\n") boolean stopAll()
      Stops all active time entries by updating their end time and calculating the duration.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • cleanUpOldData

      @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM time_entry WHERE start_Time < CURDATE() - INTERVAL :interval DAY;") int cleanUpOldData(int interval)
      Cleans up old time entries based on a specified interval.
      Parameters:
      interval - the number of days to keep in the database
      Returns:
      the number of time entries deleted

    • getTotalDurationForPeriod

      @Query("SELECT SUM(duration) AS total_duration\nFROM time_entry\nWHERE user_Id = :id\nAND start_time >= :start_date\nAND end_time <= :end_date\n") double getTotalDurationForPeriod(Long id, Timestamp start_date, Timestamp end_date)
      Method to get the total duration for a user in a specified period
      Parameters:
      id - the user id
      start_date - the start date of the period
      end_date - the end date of the period
      Returns:
      the total duration for the user in the specified period

    • getUserDurationsForPeriod

      @Query("SELECT t.task_Id, SUM(te.duration) AS total_Dur\nFROM time_entry te JOIN task t ON te.task_Id = t.task_Id\nWHERE te.user_Id = :id AND te.start_Time >= :start_date\nAND te.start_Time <= :end_date\nGROUP BY t.task_Id\nORDER BY t.creation_date DESC;\n") List<TaskDuration> getUserDurationsForPeriod(Long id, Timestamp start_date, Timestamp end_date)
      Method to get a list of TaskDuration objects for a user in a specified period
      Parameters:
      id - the user id
      start_date - the start date of the period
      end_date - the end date of the period
      Returns:
      a list of TaskDuration objects representing task durations for the user in the specified period

    • getUserWorkIntervalsForPeriod

      @Query(" SELECT t.task_Id, t.theme, t.description, te.start_Time, te.end_Time\n FROM time_entry te JOIN task t ON te.task_Id = t.task_Id WHERE te.user_Id = 1 AND start_Time >= :start_date AND end_Time <= :end_date\n ORDER BY start_Time DESC;\n") List<WorkInterval> getUserWorkIntervalsForPeriod(Long id, Timestamp start_date, Timestamp end_date)
      Method to get a list of WorkInterval objects for a user in a specified period
      Parameters:
      id - the user id
      start_date - the start date of the period
      end_date - the end date of the period
      Returns:
      a list of WorkInterval objects representing work intervals for the user in the specified period
